reviews.text: We were going to catch a show at the Ohio Theater with a group of 8 people, and after debating on various dining options in the area, we settled on Sidebar....

This is my third time at Sidebar and it is still as lovely as ever! The service is very friendly and the food comes out FAST. 

Highlight of the meal was...
I love going to sidebar mainly for their happy hour.  It's a nice place for tapas, and they have so many options to choose from. Prices are really good as...
